item.title: Using Microsoft Sentinel MCP Server with GitHub Copilot for AI-Powered Threat Hunting
item.description:
Introduction This post walks through how to get started with the Microsoft Sentinel MCP Server and showcases a hands-on demo integrating with Visual Studio Code and GitHub Copilot. Using the MCP server, you can run natural language queries against Microsoft Sentinel’s security data lake, enabling faster investigations and simplified threat hunting using tools you already know. This blog includes a real-world prompt you can use in your own environment and highlights the power of AI-assisted security workflows.
